comments_since_last_sample.body: Ash, I've gotta say I have taken your advice on many fragrances, and I haven't been disappointed yet!. Cheers! I haven't worn AdG before, and my local stores rarely have a tester available. Please enter me in the draw :)

Watch your channnel …you are the best …at 60 yrs. old living in God’s Waiting Room(Florida)…my favorite scent …the one I wear almost on a daily basis is ADG ….running low…Xmas coming …and Grandkids need stuff..would appreciate a full bottle of G-pop juice….thanks again for your great vids

I'd like to join the giveaway as well! ADG has been my signature scent since I started wearing fragrances in middle school and has never steered me wrong. As you said it works anytime, any situation, and I still love it to this day. Will likely be my scent of the day tomorrow now that I think about it.
I rocked Aqua Di Gio for a little bit back in the early 2000's. It was my buddies signature scent and I always used a few sprays haha.
Those "times" or "situations" you referred to (Summer, Winter, etc.) are called "seasons."  Glad to help.
Rocked the ADG bck in college...would love to be selected
Yeah I would like to be entered in the giveaway! I own Profumo, but that incense doesn’t work that well in the intense heat and humidity of Florida… at least on my skin
I‘ve smelled it a bunch of times on different people, in the store, basically everywhere but never actually worn it myself. I quite like the scent tho. It makes sense why a lot of people like it!
I wanna be a part of the giveaway, i've only tried this fragance in stores because i think its a little too expensive where i live, but i love it
I have never tried it
Of course ill love to enter the giveaway. I haven't sampled the original but i love profumo. The orignal would be a nice addition to my recent collection.
Would love to be entered in the conteat, I've never had the original Armani..I've had a sample of profondo..that I like
I have ADG profumo and I absolutely love the scent but I haven't tried the original. I would like to enter the giveaway.
ADG was my first ever fragrance! Started off my fragrance collection but is long gone and empty :( I’d love to own it again
I like to enter the giveaway i only have the clones adg would be perfect having the original
I would like to be entered in the giveaway. I never owned any ADG fragrance.
ADG I used when I was a teenager, then got the Perry Ellis dupe which had much better longevity (for me).  I ran out of that a year ago so could do with a replacement! :)

I have had Acqua di Gio but in a very different way. Before collecting fragrances, I used to have one signature scent per year and in 2019, that was Invictus. I was running low on that and wanted a change so agreed a swap with my brother for his Acqua di Gio (which is his favourite fragance and was also running low). I guess you would say I got an upgrade lol.
Never had nor tried ADG... Wouldn't mind giving it a shot if I could get it for free. Haha :)
Aqua Di Gio is a classic, had it several times in my younger days. AMAZING FRAGRANCE!!!! Great suggestions Ash!!!
